text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few days after tryouts, I catch sight<n>of Special Week at
the school<n>cafeteria.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Wow, that was delicious! Phew,<n>nothing beats a nice carrot
hamburger<n>steak!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Their carrot sauté was great too! Oh,<n>and the carrot
yakisoba! Even the<n>carrot gratin! Carrots galore! ♪

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Wow, I'm surprised you're able to<n>say that after three
servings of, well...<n>everything! I dunno how you do it!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: And if we look over here... Helloooo?<n>El? Still alive?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Urk... I could only keep up with you<n>until your second
serving, but three?<n>You really are something else, Spe...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Um... El?! Are you feeling all right?!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
You just noticed? She's been like<n>this for a while now. You
gotta pay<n>more attention to your surroundings,<n>Spe!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Hey, El? We have a scrimmage after<n>this... Are you going to
be okay?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
D-don't worry about me! Just a bit<n>full, that's all. I'm the
invincible<n>condor...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I'll get better before we start our<n>race!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Trying to get a lead before the race<n>even begins, huh? I
gotta say, Spe,<n>you're quite the tactician.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I am not! C'mon, El! Please pullyourself together!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I told you... I'm fine! Burp.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, Spe, you don't need to say<n>please every time
something<n>happens!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I thought I told you to quit being so<n>tense! Loosen up a bit!
Talk to me like<n>you would to any other classmate!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
You did say that, didn't ya? I thought<n>it was funny to hear
coming from you,<n>though. You're just as polite as she<n>is!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
It's just easier for me to be this way!<n>But enough about
me! It's Spe we're<n>talking about now!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I guess... you're right?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Sorry... I just don't wanna sound<n>rude or anything. I get
super nervous<n>when I talk to people, so I end up<n>being too
polite. It's a bad habit, I<n>know.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I was worried that I wouldn't be able<n>to get along with
anybody, y'know?<n>Especially at the start, ehehe...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
It's your first time being around other<n>girls your age, not to
mention other<n>Umamusume, right? You sure are shy<n>for
someone so friendly!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Ya gotta kick back and relax once in a<n>while! Live a little,
y'know? Just take<n>it from me!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: How about we ditch class and go<n>fishing?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Kick back and... relax? Like you do?<n>I'm not sure that's
really... possible?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Hey, who worries about having fun?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Special Week enjoys a hearty meal<n>with her friends, lost in
conversation<n>from the first to the very last bite.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Special Week finally notices my<n>presence and runs over to
me to chat.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Trainer! Have you tried the<n>carrot hamburger steak?
It's amazing!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe food this delicious is<n>free! And
all-you-can-eat too! Tracen<n>Academy sure pulls out all the
stops!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
And the cherry on top is being able to<n>eat with my friends!
Ehehe... I'm so<n>glad I could enroll here.
choice_data_list: You're really enjoying the student life, huh?
You're really enjoying the student life, huh?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Uh-huh! El and Sei... Grass and King<n>too... They're all so nice
to me!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I grew up alone with my mom, so<n>ever since I was little, I
wanted a<n>friend I could talk to or run with!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
So being able to chat with my friends<n>and compete with
each other like this<n>is like a dream come true!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Speaking of which, I sent my mom a<n>letter with a picture of
me and my<n>classmates.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
She was super happy about it! She<n>told me that she even
ran all the way<n>over to our neighbors to show them!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
But our closest neighbors live, like,<n>five kilometers away
from us,<n>y'know? Mom sure does love to get<n>worked up
over nothin'.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Special Week happily continues to tell<n>me about her mother
and hometown. It<n>seems like she doesn't really have<n>any
problems with her life here at the<n>academy.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: ...Or so I thought.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Later that day, while out on a walk, I<n>spot a stressed
student raising her<n>voice at Special Week.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Um... S-sorry, could you say that<n>again?

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
Once more then! I'm asking why you<n>pulled that crazy stunt
during our<n>scrimmage yesterday! If you had just<n>stayed
put, I would've won!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Well, um... I-I also wanted to win, so<n>y'know...

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text: But you already have your own<n>trainer!

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
So why'd you have to do that?!<n>Couldn't you have just let
me win?!

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
I don't have much time left! I gotta<n>get scouted soon, or else
I might not<n>get scouted at all! I won't be able to<n>make it...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: "Won't be able to make it?" W-what<n>do you mean?

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
It's my mom. She's been in and out<n>of the hospital for as
long as I can<n>remember. But lately, she's been<n>getting
worse. Even her doctor is<n>seriously worried.

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
She's been waiting ages for me to<n>make my debut! She's
the one who<n>pushed me this far... But at this rate, I<n>won't
be able to make it in time...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Th-that's awful...

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
So please, Spe... Let me win the next<n>scrimmage, okay?
That'd be okay,<n>right?!

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text: We're friends... aren't we?

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text: Oh... Class is starting soon. Let's get<n>going, Spe.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: O-okay...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Later that day, Special Week runs in<n>another scrimmage
race. Her usual<n>grit and energy are missing, however,<n>and
she ends up in seventh place.
